spells.name: Force Hook Charge
spells.description: Hook of force drags you to the target.

spells.name: Force Punch
spells.description: Target takes 1d4 force damage per level and is pushed away.

spells.name: Monstrous Physique I
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium monstrous humanoid.

spells.name: Undead Anatomy I
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium undead.
